賞.definition: to bestow (a reward); to give (to an inferior); to hand down; a reward (bestowed by a superior); to appreciate (beauty)

賞光.definition: to do sb the honor (of attending etc); to put in an appearance; to show up

賞心悅目.definition: warms the heart and delights the eye (idiom); pleasing; delightful

賞析.definition: understanding and enjoying (a work of art)

賞識.definition: to appreciate; to recognize the worth of sth; appreciation

賞賜.definition: to bestow a reward; a reward
